definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
is/are/am/yes/to be
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
to offer/to supply/to provide/to furnish
to raise/to increase/to improve
to raise (an issue)/to propose/to put forward/to suggest/to post (on a website)/to withdraw (cash)
to promote/to upgrade
to shift to an earlier date/to do sth ahead of time/in advance
to remind/to call attention to/to warn of
to submit (a report etc)/to refer (a problem) to sb
to mention/to raise (a subject)/to refer to
premise/precondition/prerequisite
to point out/to remind (sb of sth)/to suggest/suggestion/tip/reminder/notice
to mention/to speak of/to lift/to pick up/to arouse/to raise (a topic, a heavy weight, one's fist, one's spirits etc)
proposal/draft resolution/motion (to be debated)/to propose a bill/to make a proposal
to nominate
to question/to quiz/to grill
proposal/suggestion/to propose/to suggest

sentences.english: Now you can be the question asker.
sentences.chinese: 现在你可以做提问题的人。

sentences.english: The first thing he asked me was to help him get some dynamite, so that he could blow up Kim Jong Il.
sentences.chinese: 他对我提的第一个要求就是帮他搞到一些炸药。

sentences.english: Please come back to renew your passbook or get your money in seven days.
sentences.chinese: 七天后来补领新存折，也可以提现金。

sentences.english: Harold said the man should lift his left shoulder and showed him how to do this.
sentences.chinese: 哈罗德告诉那人应该上提左肩，并教他怎么做。

sentences.english: The doctor warned her that her uterus might rupture if she lifted something heavy.
sentences.chinese: 医生警告她不要提重物，避免子宫破裂。

sentences.english: Optical lift is different from the aerodynamic lift created by an airfoil.
sentences.chinese: 光学提拉力与机翼翼面产生的空气动力不同。

sentences.english: The pace questions get asked, answered, liked etc. is too fast on Quora.
sentences.chinese: 在Quora，提问题和回答问题的节奏都太快了。

sentences.english: So I said to members of the Wang Yongzheng, the proposal also must adhere to.
sentences.chinese: 所以我对王永正委员说，这个提案还要坚持提。

sentences.english: Butterfly forward movement is caused by arm pull and hip movement upwards.
sentences.chinese: 蝶向前是靠拉臂上提臀促成。

sentences.english: This paper on the above problem is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文母鲡对以上提问题展开讨论。

sentences.english: The first Chinese book entered the Library as early as 1632.
sentences.chinese: 图书馆早在1632年开始收藏提一本中国书。

sentences.english: All sorts of fine-sounding schemes were brought forward.
sentences.chinese: 各种各样动听的计划给提了出来。

sentences.english: This also includes other caffeinated drinks, by the way.
sentences.chinese: 顺便提一下，这也包括其他含咖啡因的饮料。

sentences.english: And btw, all the Chinese Pollutionfigures are fudged.
sentences.chinese: 顺便提一句，所有有关中国污染的诗句都是捏造的。

sentences.english: By the way, I don't want a night flight.
sentences.chinese: 随便提一下，我不要夜航班机。

sentences.english: I’d rather live with a good question than a bad answer.
sentences.chinese: 我宁愿提一个好问题也不愿意给出一个坏答案。

definition: to talk about/to mention/(preposition) as for
to mention/to speak of/to lift/to pick up/to arouse/to raise (a topic, a heavy weight, one's fist, one's spirits etc)
to mention/to raise (a subject)/to refer to
to mention/to raise (a subject)/to bring to sb's attention
as for/when it comes to
calm/poised
to mention/to bring up (a subject)/with regard to/as for
to raise (an issue)/to propose/to put forward/to suggest/to post (on a website)/to withdraw (cash)
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
exception/to be an exception
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
surname Tan
in short/in a word/in brief
an old observation (idiom)/a truism/banal comments
to think of/to call to mind/to anticipate
to say sth
to emphasize (a statement)/to stress
